original_title: Metallica: Live in Dallas, Texas - August 3, 2000
overview: Filmed during the second of two free makeup shows at Starplex Amphitheater in Dallas, TX on August 3, 2000. **Please note that there is very little crowd noise picked up by the stage mics and there was no known audience recording to mix in.**
title: Metallica: Live in Dallas, Texas - August 3, 2000
